articles.description: Manchester United's campaign is resembling a dismal and rapid retreat after losing 3-0 to Manchester City, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Manchester derby demonstrates gulf between clubs'

articles.description: A major military and police search is under way for the father of Liverpool player Luis Diaz in Colombia, with the country's authorities offering a £40,000 reward for information leading to his rescue.
articles.title: Major search under way in Colombia for Diaz's father

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen takes a dominant victory in the Mexico City Grand Prix to break his own record for wins in a single Formula 1 season.
articles.title: Verstappen wins restarted Mexico City GP after crash

articles.description: Hosts India are laser focused on winning the World Cup - and their thumping win over England suggests a changing of the guard.
articles.title: 'England fade on night that feels like start of new era'

articles.description: Watch highlights as England slump to another defeat, losing to India by 100 runs, as the hosts continued their unbeaten start to the Cricket World Cup in Lucknow.
articles.title: Abject England slump to heavy defeat by India

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Wolfsburg and Germany forward Alexandra Popp, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2023 award.
articles.title: Is Popp your Women's Footballer of the Year?

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who is back to his predatory best? Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Lyon's Ligue 1 match at Marseille is postponed after visiting boss Fabio Grosso is "seriously injured" when his team's bus is attacked on the way to the ground.
articles.title: Lyon boss Grosso 'seriously injured' in bus attack

articles.description: Liverpool's players show their support to absent team-mate Luis Diaz during a comfortable win over Nottingham Forest at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool show support for absent Diaz in Forest win

articles.description: Match of the Day 2 pundit Danny Murphy assesses Manchester United's defensive issues in their 3-0 derby defeat to Manchester City.
articles.title: Man Utd were all over the place - Murphy
